game.name: Foot Doctor
game.description:
Friends you are going to play the role of a very responsible person in this brand new girls game! You are a reputed foot doctor of your city and your clinic is generally full of patients with different types of foot pain and injuries. Today many patients have already visited at your clinic and waiting for their turn. Pick up the one with the biggest problem and start providing him or her with the best treatment while helping patients deal with foot pain in Foot Doctor!

We know that it is not going to be easy at all since you have multiple problems to deal with today. Grab your medical tools and get ready to perform multiple surgical procedures in the emergency rooms! All your patients trust on your skills a lot so feel free to heal all sorts of wounds while saving their lives in this HTML5 doctor game. Different patients have different problems so ask your patients about their problems before inviting them to the surgical room!

You can find patients with foot that is full of blood, warts and shattered glass. Collect the ice cube and rub it on the swollen red areas. Make sure to remove warts with the help of a syringe and then out the shattered glass pieces using a pair of tweezers. Apply the disinfectant spray directly on his or her wounds to make him or her heal faster in this hospital simulator! Give him or her x-ray, fix the broken bones and cut his or nails! Play free surgical games online for free here without download!
